about_the_game:
// Who This Game is For: //

Fans of adventure, action, and mystery

// How to Play: //

The core gameplay mechanics are easy to learn, hard to master:

  • Get from the start of the stage to the power gem as quickly as possible

  • Time your moves strategically, because you need to manage your stamina

  • Each movement (running, jumping, rolling/inflating, gliding, diving) uses some of your stamina, but it recharges with time

  • Your assistant POD robot can launch you through the air and water or boost you on the ground, so alternate between using it and your own movement abilities to find the most efficient way to the power gem

  • For the more daring ones and expert gamers, a collectable ancient scroll is precariously placed in each stage

And remember, the timer starts only after your character touches the start flag!

// Story: //

SPHEROCIOUS is an atmospheric adventure set in the heart of the Brazilian Amazon jungle.

Beneath the canopy resides a unique ecosystem. Brave explorers, hopeful researchers and greedy corporations alike are drawn to the depths of the wilds, all for vastly different reasons.

Soon after arriving, a young biologist named Omi discovers the plot of a logging company and enlists the help of a strange sloth named Shinobu and other native creatures in a desperate attempt to reclaim the rainforest.

Venture across untouched landscapes as you battle corrupted AI driven machines. With the help of your robotic assistant, launch yourself through crumbling, ancient architecture, and harness a lost civilization's power source in order to reclaim your land.

Take matters into your own claws!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard sound
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad Recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: In this jungle adventure, take on the role of endangered animals forced into a defensive territorial battle. Roll, bounce, and blast your way through the Amazon’s uncharted locales. Save fellow animal guardians and push a greedy corporate logging operation out of your rainforest home!
